meanings.definition: a cell that is capable of developing into a new individual without fertilization
meanings.sent1: The agametes in the pond multiplied rapidly, creating new organisms.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the agametes to understand their ability to reproduce asexually.
meanings.sent3: The agametes threw a party to celebrate their independent way of reproducing.
meanings.sent4: The agametes were like tiny superheroes, creating life without any external help.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the agametes looked like tiny factories producing new life.

meanings.definition: a reproductive cell that does not require fertilization for development
meanings.sent1: The agametes of the plant were able to grow into new plants without needing pollen.
meanings.sent2: In some species, agametes can develop into offspring without the need for mating.
meanings.sent3: The agametes decided to take a break from fertilization and go on a solo adventure.
meanings.sent4: The agametes were like independent pioneers, forging new life paths without fertilization.
meanings.sent5: The agametes' ability to thrive without fertilization was truly remarkable.
